title: League of legends visual error download

replies.body:
It sounds like your PC may have a current installation of Microsoft Visual C++ 2010 that is corrupted or missing files. I suspect that this can be resolved by uninstalling all current versions of it, then installing a fresh copy [from here](http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=3387).

Let me know if this resolved it.
This did not resolve my issue. I still receive Error 1935 on Microsoft Visual C++ 2005 Redistributable (x64)
